version_description:
We’ve fixed some problems and added cool new features tot the app! Previously:

+ FINESCANNER FOR iMESSAGE.
+ TODAY WIDGET.
+ NEW DESIGN.

If you tried our new features and have something to say about them, don’t hold it in! Share your thoughts in a review!

We fixed a lot of small issues and continued integration of new design.
While we are working on more cool new features to add to the app, please inspire us with your feedback in the App Store!

This holiday season we have prepared a surprise for you: our favorite FineScanner has had a make-over and now a has a cool fresh look: the camera screen, editor and document library are all brand new! The modern design is based on the usability research, surveys and your reviews.
We hope you like it and find that FineScanner has become easier, faster and even more enjoyable to use.
We wish you wonderful holidays filled with unforgettable memories!

This holiday season we have prepared a surprise for you: our favorite FineScanner has had a make-over and now a has a cool fresh look: the camera screen, editor and document library are all brand new! The modern design is based on the usability research, surveys and your reviews.
We hope you like it and find that FineScanner has become easier, faster and even more enjoyable to use.
We wish you wonderful holidays filled with unforgettable memories!

New Year – New Exciting Update! You can witness the app’s transformation as the new design, a better UX and UI find their way across the broad functionality, inspired by your reviews and comments:
+ Added iPad Pro support.
+ Fixed issue with page opening - documents open at the necessary page.
+ The page order is saved correctly even after complex editing.
+ A number of other fixes and improvements.
Please feel free to leave reviews, we read all of them and take them into consideration.

In this version, we have polished our new design and fixed some little things:
+ switching between photos while cropping them
+ creating multi-page documents over 25 pages
+ Google Drive authorization in iOS 8 and more.
Dear friends! We carefully read all of your comments and try to correct anything you do not like. We hope you take a moment and give us a fresh 5-star rating!

This interim release includes small bug fixes.
While we are working on more cool new features to add to the app, please inspire us with your feedback in the App Store!

In this version, we’ve made lots of changes under the hood. Most significantly:

+ By popular request, the Buy Premium button will disappear from the main screen after you’ve made at least one in-app purchase, including Remove Ads.
+ When you scan a book using the BookScan feature, it is automatically tagged as “book.” Simply type “book” in the search field if you want to see all of your book scans.
+ Removed the 25 MB cap on scans sent by e-mail. You’ll still see a warning that the file is oversized, but will be able to e-mail it without hassle.
+ Corrected the error that caused some devices to restart.

Please leave your feedback on our page in the App Store. We will be happy to answer (Yes, we can do it!) and provide all assistance we can.

Small improvements and bug fixes are waiting for you in this version. Major from previous release:
+ Buy Premium button will disappear from the main screen after you’ve made at least one in-app purchase, including Remove Ads.
+ When you scan a book using the BookScan feature, it is automatically tagged as “book.” Simply type “book” in the search field if you want to see all of your book scans.

Please leave your feedback in the App Store. We will be happy to answer and help!

When you scan a book in the BookScan mode, it is automatically tagged as “book.” Simply type “book” in the search field if you want to see all of your book scans.
+ other improvements.

Do you like FineScanner?
We will be happy if you leave a review on the App Store.
Thanks a lot!

In this release, we have made a few handy improvements before the big iOS 11 update:
+ Now every auto uploaded document can be password protected: find Password for PDF in Settings and choose to use a password.
+ You can choose the format of the files you automatically upload to the cloud. Go to Settings, find Cloud services and choose the size and format of your files: original or small, JPG or PDF.
+ We have fixed a few small bugs – now the app runs even faster and smoother.
Your reviews are greatly appreciated as always!

We've made a few improvements before the upcoming iOS 11 update. Major since the previous release:
+ Every auto uploaded document can be password protected.
+ Choose the format of the files you automatically upload to the cloud.

Do you like FineScanner?
Do you have any question or suggestion?
Please leave a review!
We will be happy to answer and help.

Thanks a lot for your reviews. You're awesome!

FineScanner is now fully compatible with iOS 11 and includes the most excellent features from new OS:
+ The app has received a brand-new PDF viewer and a set of easy-to-use PDF tools: signature, highlighter, pen, text box, and redaction of sensitive content.
+ The Drag and Drop functionality allows to quickly import images and PDFs to FineScanner for recognition and export generated PDFs and recognized text to other apps.
+ Document boundaries detection and auto-crop accuracy improved by 53% thanks to new detection technology.
If you tried our new features and have something to say about them, don’t hold it in! Share your thoughts in a review!

We fixed issues with Dropbox, Box, Yandex.Disk, which appeared after the release of iOS 11. In addition, we improved text tool in the annotation mode.
Major changes introduced in previous release:
+ Full support of iOS 11.
+ The app has received a set of easy-to-use PDF tools: signature, highlighter, pen, text box, and redaction of sensitive content.
+ The Drag and Drop functionality on iPad.
+ Document boundaries detection and auto-crop accuracy improved by 53%.
Please feel free to leave reviews, we read all of them and take them into consideration.

In this release, we supported iPhone X interface so you can enjoy FineScanner on your very new device! Moreover, we fixed issues with email sending loop and Yandex.Disk.
Major changes introduced in past releases:
+ The app has received a set of easy-to-use PDF tools: signature, highlighter, pen, text box, and redaction of sensitive content.
+ The Drag and Drop functionality on iPad.
Please feel free to leave reviews, we read all of them and take them into consideration.

We've made improvements of FineScanner on iPhone X and a few bug fix.
Major changes introduced in past releases:
+ PDF tools: signature, highlighter, pen, text box, and redaction of sensitive content.
+ The Drag and Drop functionality on iPad.
Please feel free to leave reviews, we read all of them and take them into consideration.

In this release we fixed sync issues of files with iMessage and Today Widget. Also, the work with device memory was optimized.

+ The Drag and Drop functionality on iPad.
Please leave your feedback in the App Store. We will be happy to read, answer and help!

Major changes introduced in past releases:
+ PDF tools.
+ The Drag and Drop functionality on iPad.
Please leave your feedback in the App Store. We will be happy to read, answer and help!

In this release the technology of book scanning has been improved: the problem with page losses in multi-page documents’ upload to the server was resolved; the crop of book page spreads was improved, a progress bar with a number of exported to BookScan Server pages appeared.
Major changes introduced in past releases:
+ PDF tools.
+ The Drag and Drop functionality on iPad.

Please leave your feedback in the App Store. We will be happy to read, answer and help!

In this release the technology of book scanning has been improved: the problem with page losses in multi-page documents’ upload to the server was resolved; the crop of book page spreads was improved, a progress bar with a number of exported to BookScan Server pages appeared.
Major changes introduced in past releases:
+ PDF tools.
+ The Drag and Drop functionality on iPad.

Please leave your feedback in the App Store. We will be happy to read, answer and help!

In this release we fixed problems with document displaying. If you still encounter a difficulty, please contact immediately our support team: mobile_support@abbyy.com.
Major changes introduced in past releases:
+Improved book scanning technology
+ PDF tools.
Please leave your feedback in the App Store. We will be happy to read, answer and help!

Personal data protection is a high priority for us. In this release, we made changes in the app and updated Privacy Policy in accordance with the new General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) in European Union law, which comes into force from May 25, 2018.
Please leave your feedback in the App Store. We will be happy to read, answer and help!

In this release, we fixed issues with Open In and export to cloud storages. If you still encounter a difficulty, please contact our support at mobile_support@abbyy.com.
Major changes introduced in past releases:
+Improved book scanning technology
+ PDF tools.
Please leave your feedback in the App Store. We will be happy to read, answer and help!

Overall performance improvements and bug fixes are waiting for you in this version.
Major changes introduced in past releases:
+Improved book scanning technology
+ PDF tools.
Please leave your feedback in the App Store. We will be happy to read, answer and help!

In this release, we introduce a couple of amazing improvements:
+ In the camera, you can switch between two shooting modes. "One-page" allows you to check and adjust the quality of shooting and cropping the page borders immediately after each page. "Multi-page" allows you to shoot all the pages in a row and then edit them.
+ We improved the quality of the document displaying on the preview screen and after saving. Please note that it does not affect the document quality when exporting.
We are waiting for your updated reviews. We love to read them on our daily stand-ups to lift the team's spirit!

FineScanner is now fully compatible with iOS 12 and understands Siri commands. For example, to open a scan of your passport using Siri: Go to the document properties and select "Siri Shortcut". Tap the record button to create a voice command: "Open my passport". Done!

Feel free to leave your review on the App Store and tell us if you like the Siri Shortcut and iOS 12 support in FineScanner!

FineScanner is now fully compatible with iOS 12 and understands Siri commands. For example, to open a scan of your passport using Siri: Go to the document properties and select "Siri Shortcut". Tap the record button to create a voice command: "Open my passport". Done!

Feel free to leave your review on the App Store and tell us if you like the Siri Shortcut and iOS 12 support in FineScanner!

Meet the next generation of mobile scanners – FineScanner AI 7!
+ Simplify and speed up your document workflow with artificial intelligence. Free yourself from tedious scrolling with ABBYY Neural Networks that automatically find images with text and documents in the device gallery.
+ Extract text twice as fast without an Internet connection. Switch to offline mode and get results as plain text in a second! Offline mode works without connecting to the external server, which provides complete privacy and security. Use online recognition if you want to keep the document layout (headings, tables, etc.).

Do you like this update? We will be happy to get your feedback here on the App Store!

We have changed the app icon to celebrate the 10 years anniversary of our apps!
FineScanner, TextGrabber, and Business Card Reader are now indispensable digitizing assets for over 10 million people across the globe. Join our celebration and stay tuned! More cool features are coming soon!
We would love to see your reviews on the App Store!

Overall stability improvements.
The most important in previous releases:
+ ABBYY Mobile 10 years anniversary icon change
+ Accelerated app launch.
+ Improved interface for the new iPad Pro.
+ Camera supports 60 frames per second.
+ Siri Shortcuts support.
We would appreciate your reviews on the App Store!

+ Overall stability improvements.
The most important in previous releases:
+ Accelerated app launch.
+ Improved interface for the new iPad Pro.
+ Camera supports 60 frames per second.
+ Siri Shortcuts support.
We would appreciate your reviews on the App Store!

+ Share Extension support: tap «Share» while looking through images and choose FineScanner. The file will open in the app.
+ Document preview in Siri search results.

The most important from previous releases:

+ iOS 12 and Siri Shortcuts support;
+ New design of: camera, preview screen, edit screen, crop screen and filters screen;
+ 60 frames per second support in FineScanner camera.

Share you feedback at the FineScanner page in AppStore.

FineScanner has significantly changed. The design was absolutely rethought:
+ camera,
+ preview,
+ edit screen,
+ crop screen,
+ filter screen.
What’s more, the app now automatically goes to edit screen if the photo is imported from the gallery.

The most important in the previous releases:
+ iOS 12 and Siri Shortcuts support
+ Choose Batch mode to scan multiple pages
+ Quality of document preview and saved documents has increased

Welcome the new FineScanner and share your feedback in AppStore.

FineScanner camera now supports 60 frames per second (60 FPS). Documents detection became faster and more accurate with higher FPS.

Major changes introduced in past releases:
+ The new design of camera, preview, edit, crop and filter screens.
+ Siri Shortcuts and iOS 12.

Share your feedback on FineScanner in AppStore.

+ Share Extension support: tap «Share» while looking through images and choose FineScanner. The file will open in the app.
+ Document preview in Siri search results.

The most important from previous releases:

+ 60 frames per second support in FineScanner camera.

Share you feedback at the FineScanner page in AppStore.

+ Improved interface for the new iPad Pro

In this release we added even more simplicity and easiness:
+ New design of recognition settings. Updated navigation makes processing to OCR fast and comprehensible.
The most important in previous releases:

Do you like this update? We will be happy to get your feedback here on the App Store!

Celebrate with us as we rolled out new feature update to support the new iOS 13 and Siri Shortcuts for your favorite document scanner! FineScanner AI now works flawlessly on iOS 13 and helps you automate scan management with new Siri commands:
- Get PDF
- Get Recognized Document.
Create Siri Commands for these actions to use your voice for opening PDF or recognized documents. Extend the flow of actions with, for example, emailing or sharing the files.

Siri will remember what you often do in FineScanner and will prompt you to perform these actions with a single click. Siri Suggestions can be found by clicking on the Spotlight search bar or they may also appear on your lock screen if Siri thinks you are about to perform related action. Siri can offer you three FineScanner actions:
•Scan Document
•Open Documents
•Open Books

As before, you can add Siri shortcuts to your favorite scans inside FineScanner. For example, to open a passport scan using the Siri, go to the properties of that scan, select Siri command, and create the ‘Open my passport’ command. Now, if you tell Siri to: ‘Open my passport’, the scan will appear on the phone screen.
Watch the video and read how to set up and use Siri in FineScanner in our blog mobileblog.abbyy.com/en

If you enjoy the new FineScanner features for iOS 13, please feel free to leave your review on the App Store.

+Overall stability improvements

As before, you can add Siri shortcuts to your favorite scans inside FineScanner. For example, to open a passport scan using the Siri, go to the properties of that scan, select Siri command, and create the ''Open my 'passport' command. Now, if you tell Siri to: ''Open my passport'', the scan will appear on the phone screen.
Watch the video and read how to set up and use Siri in FineScanner in our blog mobileblog.abbyy.com/en
If you enjoy the new FineScanner features for iOS 13, please feel free to leave your review on the App Store.

We added the VoiceOver feature and FineScanner AI can now be operated by visually impaired users!
With this feature, you can have a phone screen read, including buttons, icons, links, and other interface elements, and use gestures to navigate and select their options.
To enable this feature go to the Accessibility tab and choose VoiceOver.

The most important in previous releases:
Automate scan management with new Siri commands:
- Get PDF
- Get Recognized Document.

ABBYY team wishes you Happy Holidays!
In the latest update, we have fixed some bugs and improved the app's performance.
The most important in previous releases:
+ We added the VoiceOver feature, and visually impaired users can now operate the app!
+Automate scan management with new Siri commands for the Shortcuts app.
If you enjoy FineScanner, please feel free to leave your review on the App Store.

With this update, we have brought you the new paper sizes:
- A3 (29,7 × 42 cm)
- A6 (10,5 x 14,8 cm)
- US Tabloid (27,9 x 43,2 cm)
- Credit / ID / Business card (8,8 x 5,2 cm)
Now, whatever type of document you have, it will be saved in the correct size. Choose the needed paper size right on the editor screen or in the properties of a scanned file.
The most important in previous releases:
+ We added the VoiceOver feature, and visually impaired users can now operate the app!
+ Automate scan management with new Siri commands for the Shortcuts app.
If you enjoy FineScanner AI, please feel free to leave your review on the App Store. Read more about FineScanner in our blog mobileblog.abbyy.com/en

+ Introducing FineScanner 8.0. The smart gallery will automatically classify documents into 7 types:
1. A4
2. Books
3. Business cards 
4. Handwritten
5. IDs
6. Other docs
7. Receipts
Open the gallery in FineScanner and tap Try to activate the feature.
+ Search text on photos. Type a text containing on a photo into a Search field in the gallery. FineScanner will find photos that have this text.
When you turn on the new smart gallery for the first time, classification and OCR will take some time depending on the number of photos in the gallery. Classification and OCR work locally on-device without connection to the Internet.
+ Define doc size in AR. It will be useful for non-standard documents and further printing them out in proper proportions.
Do you like this update, as well as we do? We will be glad to see your feedback on the App Store!

+ Introducing FineScanner 8.0. The smart gallery will automatically classify documents into 7 types:
1. A4
2. Books
3. Business cards 
4. Handwritten
5. IDs
6. Other docs
7. Receipts
Open the gallery in FineScanner and tap Try to activate the feature.
+ Search text on photos. Type a text containing on a photo into a Search field in the gallery. FineScanner will find photos that have this text.
When you turn on the new smart gallery for the first time, classification and OCR will take some time depending on the number of photos in the gallery. Classification and OCR work locally on-device without connection to the Internet.
+ Define doc size in AR. It will be useful for non-standard documents and further printing them out in proper proportions.
Do you like this update, as well as we do? We will be glad to see your feedback on the App Store!

+ FineScanner is now called FineReader PDF, and also gets an icon of its famous older brother. No worries – it's still your favourite mobile scanner. You can now create scans on a mobile and export to FineReader PDF for Windows to work with scans on a computer – OCR, convert, reduct, sign with digital signature, compare, etc. FineReader PDF will gradually become an ecosystem to continuously work with documents on a mobile and a computer.
Learn more on our blog.
+ Now tags are added after successful export to cloud storages.
+ Fixed issue with changing symbols in imported PDFs.
+ Disabled shortening of symbols __ to _ after exporting to cloud storages.
Important in previous updates:
+ The smart gallery will automatically classify documents into 7 types.
+ Search text on photos.
